name: roxiler
description: <!-- supabase me SQL Editor pe jake create karo --> // create users table CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (     id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,     name VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL,     email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,     address VARCHAR(400),     password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,     role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL CHECK (role IN ('admin','user','store_owner')),     created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() );

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
